column4: can one be said to be better looking than the other. or perhaps faster, or what?
so install KDE and try it out.

one thing i am not so enjoying with linux is the momentary hesitation i get every time i do something drastic in terminal. ive already bricked one peice of electronics by tinkering. i dont plan on doing the same to my computer!
pretty hard to kill a linux box from the terminal, at least when not logged in as root
